Name: PRIMARY
Comments: Carried forward from L2 FITS file. Append BLZCORR; LMPCORR; SEDCORR; INTERPMD; FLXNRMMD; and DISPCORR keywords.

Name: INSTRUMENT_HEADER
Comments: Carried forward from L2 FITS file.

Name: RECEIPT
Description: Table of operations that have been performed on this file
Comments: Table has columns: time; code release; branch name; commit hash; function; args; status.

Name: DRP_CONFIG
Description: Pipeline details (settings etc) to go from native data to L2
Comments: Table has one column where each row captures a config entry.

Name: EXT_DESCRIPT
Description: Table describing contents of each extension
Comments: Table has two columns and each one row contains the name of an extension in the HDU and then a string description of what is in that extension

Name: ORDER_TABLE
Description: Table capturing the wavelength extent of each order in Trace 1
Comments: Required columns: physical echelle order; index echelle order; start wavelength; end wavelength.

Name: STITCHED_CORR_SCI_FLUX
Description: Order stitched and blaze-corrected flux co-added across all science traces
Comments: Shape should be a 1D array. If instrument only produces 1 science trace then this is the flux extension that gets populated.

Name: STITCHED_CORR_SCI_WAVE
Description: Order stitched barycentric- and drift-corrected wavelength solution
Comments: Shape matches STITCHED_CORR_SCI_FLUX. If instrument only produces 1 science trace then this is the wavelength extension that gets populated.

Name: STITCHED_CORR_SCI_VAR
Comments: Shape matches STITCHED_CORR_SCI_FLUX. If instrument only produces 1 science trace then this is the variance extension that gets populated.

Name: STITCHED_CORR_TRACE1_FLUX
Description: Order stitched and blaze-corrected flux in trace 1
Comments: Shape should be a 1D array. If instrument only produces 1 science trace then leave empty and only populate the STITCHED_CORR_SCI_FLUX extension.

Name: STITCHED_CORR_TRACE1_WAVE
Description: Order stitched barycentric- and drift-corrected wavelength solution corresponding to STITCHED_CORR_TRACE1_FLUX
Comments: Shape matches STITCHED_CORR_TRACE1_FLUX. Wavelengths should be in vaccuum. If instrument only produces 1 science trace then leave empty and only populate the STITCHED_CORR_SCI_WAVE extension.

Name: STITCHED_CORR_TRACE1_VAR
Description: Order stitched variance corresponding to STITCHED_CORR_TRACE1_FLUX
Comments: Shape matches STITCHED_CORR_TRACE1_FLUX. If instrument only produces 1 science trace then leave empty and only populate the STITCHED_CORR_SCI_VAR extension.

Name: STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_SCI_FLUX
Comments: This could include additional corrections such as telluric or sky corrections. Shape matches STITCHED_CORR_SCI_FLUX.

Name: STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_SCI_WAVE
Comments: Wavelength solution corresponding to the flux array in STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_SCI_FLUX. Wavelengths should be in vaccuum. Shape matches STITCHED_CORR_SCI_FLUX.

Name: STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_SCI_VAR
Comments: Variance of the STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_SCI_FLUX array. Shape matches STITCHED_CORR_SCI_FLUX.

Name: STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_TRACE1_FLUX
Description: Additionally custom corrected flux for trace 1
Comments: This could include additional corrections such as telluric or sky corrections. Shape matches STITCHED_CORR_TRACE1_FLUX.

Name: STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_TRACE1_WAVE
Comments: Wavelength solution corresponding to the flux array in STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_TRACE1_FLUX. Wavelengths should be in vaccuum. Shape matches STITCHED_CORR_TRACE1_FLUX.

Name: STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_TRACE1_VAR
Comments: Variance of STITCHED_CUSTOMCORR1_TRACE1_FLUX array. Shape matches STITCHED_CORR_TRACE1_FLUX.
